    Handler, HandlerContainer, Container, Destroyable, Dumpable, LifeCycle
    Enclosing class:
    WebSocketHandler

    public static class WebSocketHandler.Simple
extends WebSocketHandler
    Create a simple WebSocketHandler that registers a single WebSocket POJO that is created on every upgrade request.
